articles.description: TVS Ronin 225 cruiser will be equipped with a new 223 cc single-cylinder engine producing around 20 bhp and 20 Nm of peak torque
articles.content: TVS Motor Company has confirmed that it will bring a new motorcycle to the Indian market on July 6, 2022. As ever, the brand has been tight-lipped over what it will be and the speculations have been … [+2057 chars]
